name: Brian Kessman
title: VP of Product
about:
As VP of Product, I ensure our teams design and deliver products, services, and platforms that transform our clients’ businesses and create remarkable experiences for their customers. My day-to-day includes consulting with clients and guiding our product directors, project managers, UX/UI designers, growth engineers and developers in their collaboration and delivery.

Before joining Smashing Boxes, I held leadership positions with advertising, brand strategy, management consulting, and IT firms. Through this experience I’ve directed and managed some exciting large-scale digital projects for brands such as Nationwide Insurance, Travelocity, Lenovo, Burger King, California Pizza Kitchen, Cars.com, HP, HBO, NBC, USA Networks, UFC, and the San Diego Zoo.

I’m originally from the New York area where I met my beautiful wife, Jacqueline. Together we gave Los Angeles a try for a few years, but we eventually found our home in Chapel Hill.

When not at the office you can find me hanging out with my 5-year-old twin girls, Norah and Abigail, and my 9-month-old son Bennett.
